alert.note: Alert for Rock; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 7:43PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Walworth and east central Rock Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 743 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Darien, or near Delavan, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elkhorn, Delavan, Williams Bay, Walworth, Fontana-On-Geneva Lake, Darien, Richmond, Abells Corners, Tibbets, Delavan Lake, and Millard. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 320 and 323. Interstate 43 between mile markers 14 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and southeastern Wisconsin.
